name: SpecialWords
0:
”Alexa, open special words”
”Alexa, launch special words”
”Next”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: special words
des: This skill is a fun way to hear the interjections in American, Canadian, British, and Indian english accents. It plays the special words and phrases provided by Alexa Speechcons in each of the languages. You would need to change the Language setting in the Alexa app to hear words from that specific set.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
